QuestData.Title: Zuluhed the Whacked
QuestData.Description: He hides in my thoughts, mortal. He waits for me to break... for me to bend to his will.$B$BAnd this will be his undoing. I will call for him. I will tell him that I will do as he asks. When he appears, kill him and take the key!$B$BKnow this: Zuluhed is an ancient orc with unknown powers. He has surely been empowered further by Illidan. You risk your life for me in doing as I ask. Are you certain you wish to make such a sacrifice?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Zuluhed the Whacked and recover Zuluhed's Key. Use Zuluhed's Key on Zuluhed's Chains to free Karynaku.
QuestData.RewardText: I am free! You have saved us, $n!
